metadata.title: CVE-2023-4380 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A logic flaw exists in Ansible Automation platform. Whenever a privateproject is created with incorrect credentials, they are logged inplaintext. This flaw allows an attacker to retrieve the credentials fromthe log, resulting in the loss of confidentiality, integrity, andavailability.

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
ansible-core package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
